name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Time Tracker: Track Time Spent on Sites

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check how much time you spend on different sites to better your time management

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Maximize your productivity with Time Tracker, the ultimate time tracker extension for Chrome. Whether you're managing projects, tracking tasks, or simply curious about where your time goes, Time Tracker offers an intuitive, seamless experience to help you stay on top of your time management.
Time Tracker is designed for professionals, students, freelancers, and anyone looking to better manage their time. Our extension helps you stay focused, understand your time usage patterns, and ultimately improve your productivity.
How to use:
Install Time Tracker: Click "Add to Chrome" to install the Time Tracker extension.
Pin the Extension: Pin Time Tracker to your toolbar for quick access.
Start Tracking: Time Tracker activates in the background automatically. If you wish to reset stored data click the "RESET" button.
